articles.title: WPK Delegation Leaves for the UK, Russian Foreign Ministry Delegation Here
articles.content:
WPK Delegation Leaves for the UK, Russian Foreign Ministry Delegation Here 
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea led by Pak Kyong Son, vice department director of its Central Committee, left here today to visit the UK.
					Meanwhile, arriving here on the same day was a delegation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Russia led by Vice-Minister Aleksei Borodavkin.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Struggle for Human Cause of Independence
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Struggle for Human Cause of Independence
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The imperialists and all other reactionaries are making desperate efforts to stem the advance towards independence, but this is no more than an anachronistic pipedream and the international situation is further developing in favor of the peoples' cause of independence as days go by, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a signed article. 
					It goes on:
					
					The 21st century is a century of historic change in which the world people's struggle for independence is being conducted vigorously on a new higher stage. The forces for independence, progress and peace are rapidly growing stronger in confrontation between the progressive and the reactionary, independence and domination, justice and injustice, and desire for peace and war scheme and the international balance of forces is changing more favorably for the anti-imperialist independent forces.
					
					One of the important features in the world situation last year is that the Latin American people worked hard to defend socialism from the imperialist's obstruction and embody its noble idea, well aware that it is most just to take road to socialism.
					
					Another important feature is that the anti-imperialist struggle was vigorously staged on a world-wide scale.
					
					The world people who value justice and peace carried on the struggle protesting against the imperialists' policy of arms buildup and demanding the removal of aggressive military bases and foreign troops from other countries.
					
					Developing countries intensified in unity and cooperation with each other the activities to attain the common objective for the independent development and prosperity.
					
					The process of integration and unification was pushed ahead in various regions of the world.
					
					The trend of the world was developing toward multipolarization despite of the imperialists' moves to build a unipolar world. Developing countries became the more considerable force in the international arena and played bigger role in accelerating multipolarization of the world.
					
					The initiative in developing history has been taken by the peoples. The year 2009, too, will advance along the road of independence.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK to Be Observed in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK to Be Observed in Bangladesh
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- A Bangladeshi national preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 was formed in Dhaka on January 20 on the joint initiative of the Workers' Party, the National Socialist Party, the Communist Party, the Socialist Party and the People's League of Bangladesh and the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee.
					Garib Newaz, president of the People's League of Bangladesh, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The committee decided to hold colorful functions such as meeting, seminar and photo exhibition highly praising the greatness and immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary
						Kim Jong Il on the occasions of the said days.

articles.title: DPRK's Joint New Year Editorial Studied in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's Joint New Year Editorial Studied in Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- Reading and study sessions on the joint New Year editorial of the DPRK were held at the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea and by the Bangladeshi Group for the Study of the Songun Policy on Jan. 17.
					Juan Campos Vega, chairman of the Mexican institute, at the reading session said that the joint editorial reviewed with high pride the signal achievements made by the Korean people in their efforts for building a great prosperous and powerful nation and achieving the independent reunification of Korea last year under the Songun leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and put forward important tasks to be carried out for glorifying this year as a year of a new great revolutionary surge sounding the general advance.
					
					It is thanks to the experienced and seasoned leadership and outstanding political caliber of
						Kim Jong Il that the dignity and national strength of the DPRK, which has made a great history holding aloft the banner of the Juche idea, the banner of Songun, were fully demonstrated last year, he stressed.
					
					M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladeshi group, and other participants in the study session noted that the joint editorial advanced the obvious goal for building a great prosperous and powerful nation and the militant slogan inspiringly encouraging all the people to a drive for attaining the goal. And they expressed the expectation and belief that the Korean people would surely build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation in near future.
					
					The moves of the U.S. and the present south Korean authorities hindering the Korean people's struggle to achieve the independent national reunification in the idea of "By our nation itself" is bound to go bust, they said, adding that the Bangladeshi people supporting Korea's reunification strongly urge the Lee Myung Bak group to unconditionally implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia la funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia la funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito
Pyongyang, 27 de enero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea (PTC), Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea (EPC), presencio la funcion festiva que ofrecio el Coro Estatal Benemerito en ocasion del primero de enero del Ano Nuevo Lunar.
					Cuando el Dirigente aparecio en el palco, los espectadores le vitorearon con estruendosas aclamaciones de "!Viva!" deseandole con el corazon el Feliz Ano Nuevo en representacion de la unanime veneracion de todo el ejercito y el pueblo.
					
					El Dirigente respondio con su mano alzada a las aclamaciones hospitalarias reciprocandoles las felicitaciones a los espectadores que acogen la fiesta del Ano Nuevo Lunar.
					
					Disfrutaron de la funcion junto con el Dirigente el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek y Kim Yang Gon, el primer vicecanciller Kang Sok Ju, los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Ri Je Gang y Ri Jae Il, el director general de la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea, Kim Ki Ryong, el presidente del Comite Nacional de Radio y Television de Corea, Cha Sung Su, y otros cuadros directivos, asi como los comandantes del ejercito, entre otros, los generales de ejercito del EPC, Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Myong Guk y Ri Myong Su.
					
					El Coro Estatal Benemerito puso en la escena piezas entre otras el coro masculino "Cancion del General Kim Jong Il", el solo y coro masculinos "Cancion de la camaraderia" y "Hemos comenzado de la nada", el coro masculino "Se agita el bosque" y "Trotes en el monte Paektu", el solo y coro masculinos "Por la unica patria" y el cuarteto femenino "Azul cielo de mi pais".
					
					A traves de esta funcion artistica imbuida del impetu combativo, los ejecutantes mostraron bien la ferrea conviccion y voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo de llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche bajo la direccion del estimado Dirigente enarbolando la bandera roja de la revolucion.
					
					Terminado el espectaculo, el Dirigente respondio con su mano levantada a las aclamaciones entusiastas de los artistas y el publico y felicito los exitos de la funcion.
					
					Muy satisfecho de que los artistas del Coro Estatal Benemerito ofrecieron esta excelente funcion en que palpitan la conviccion y voluntad de Corea y el espiritu revolucionario de los militares, expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que todos los artistas de esta banda mostraran plenamente tambien en la digna lucha del ano nuevo su gallardo aspecto de trompetero de la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar) desplegando ampliamente sus actividades artisticas revolucionarias.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica a los imperialistas y reaccionarios
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica a los imperialistas y reaccionarios
Pyongyang, 27 de enero (ATCC) -- A pesar de que los imperialistas y los reaccionarios de todas las calanas maniobran desesperadamente para realizar su anacronica e irrisoria ilusion de frenar la corriente de la independencia, la tendencia general del mundo se torna cada dia mas favorable a la causa de independencia de los pueblos.
					Senala asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este martes y prosigue:
					
					El siglo XXI es la centuria de cambios historicos en que la lucha de los pueblos del mundo por la independencia se libra dinamicamente en una etapa nueva y alta.
					
					En medio de la confrontacion entre el progreso y la reaccion, la independencia y la dominacion, la justicia y la injusticia y la aspiracion a la paz y la artimana belicista, crecen de modo brusco las fuerzas partidarias de la independencia, el progreso y la paz y las correlaciones entre las fuerzas internacionales se hacen cada vez mas favorables a las fuerzas independientes antiimperialistas.
					
					Una de las importantes caracteristicas de la situacion mundial del ano pasado es que los pueblos de  paises latinoamericanos se dieron cuenta de que avanzar al socialismo es el mas justo camino y lucharon activamente por defender el socialismo y materializar su noble ideal rechazando las maniobras obstructoras de los imperialistas.
					
					Otra caracteristica importante es que se ha desplegado energicamente el ano pasado en el ambito mundial la lucha antiimperialista.
					
					Los pueblos del mundo, que aprecian la justicia y la paz, lucharon contra la politica de aumento de gastos militares de los imperialistas y en demanda del cierre de las agresivas bases militares y de la retirada de las tropas extranjeras  de otros paises.
					
					Se ha fortalecido el movimiento de los paises en vias de desarrollo para alcanzar su meta comun para el desarrollo independiente y la prosperidad mediante la unidad y la cooperacion.
					
					Se dio buen impulso al proceso de la integracion y la unificacion en varias regiones del mundo.
					
					A pesar de las maquinaciones de los imperialistas para unipolarizar el mundo, la corriente tomo el rumbo a la multipolarizacion.
					
					Los paises en vias de desarrollo crecieron como ente imposible de despreciar en la escena internacional y jugaron un papel importante en la promocion de la multipolizacion del mundo.
					
					Los pueblos del mundo encauzan el desarrollo de la historia. La historia del ano 2009 tambien marchara unicamente por la senda de la independencia.
